embed.title: 📛 Wanna climb the Bandit ranks?
embed.description:
**🧠 Only real Bandits earn roles.** Here's how to make your mark:

### 🧢 Monad Discord Role Hierarchy (bypass)
- **Mon** → **BOSS** <:BOSS:1364560696163172353>
- **Nad OG** → **UNDERBOSS** <:UNDERBOSS:1364560681684303902>
- **Nad** → **GANGSTER** <:GANGSTER:1364560667176206336>
- **Full Access** → **MULE** <:MULE:1364560650487074858>

### Ain't got no bypass ? Fair enough.

### ⛰️ To rise otherwise, you gotta grind your way up !
• 🎯 Participate in events: <#1364368602643562546>
• 💬 Be active in the community: reply, meme, alpha drop, help others
• 💡 Give ideas and support initiatives
• 📸 Post your creations / tweet: <#1360654139264340280>
• 🐦 Tag us on Twitter → [@monad_bandit](https://twitter.com/monad_bandit)

> _"In this city, roles ain’t given… they’re **earned**."_ – An old Bandit
